description: Help wanted - must be flexible, able to take direction and willing to work your ass off for the boss. Sometimes you have to read between the lines of the help wanted ads. Too bad dick wasn’t so quick to catch on. Mistress Shy Love gives him the job interview of a lifetime sparing very little of his ego or his flesh. Once the luscious Shy is done fucking the bound applicant she shows no mercy as he crawls around for her pleasure. If the office chair could talk, - oh, the screaming it would do. Enjoy!
title: shy love and Dick Richards
